I love QR (Quick Response) Codes, my favorite way to use them now is as a method to send data, mainly links and text to my smart phone. I know there are a thousand and one ways to do this but I love the simplicity of just using theÂ <a href="https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/mobile-barcoder/" target="_blank">Mobile Barcoder</a> extension for Firefox and the <a href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=la.droid.qr&amp;hl=en" target="_blank">QR Droid</a> app for Android.

You just highlight text or a link and right click and select "Create barcode from link" in the menu. Then it generates the QR Code, I then just use the QR Droid to capture it. I use this mainly if I want to read something on the go or send some quote that I then can send as text message. Bellow is a QR Code for the QR Droid app for the Android.

Enjoy!
